attributes.action: Theresa May sack Boris Johnson for his remarks about Libya
attributes.additional_details: Too many to mention but include his recitation of The Road to Mandalay in Burma.His assertion that Sirte could become the new Dubai once the dead bodies were cleared is grossly offensive.
attributes.background: Boris Johnnstone not a fit person to hold the office of foreign Secretary because of his habit of making jokes which denigrate and offend people of other cultures.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.
